column4: i got my friend to switch to ubuntu, but he dislikes gaim because it doesn't have "nudges" and "winks" and that other bloatful MSN junk, do any of you know how to get the official MSN messenger client working in wine with fast painting?
(sorry, I'm not being helpful, please just ignore me if looking for serious advice)
i know, i was confused too, i think these are some features that gaim doesn't have but msn do
